text: [Ej mu'minon] Cunin naʙud [va az hikmati ilohi nest], ki Alloh taolo mu'minonro ʙar in hol, ki sumo hasted [vo guzorad va mu'minu munofiqro dar kanori jakdigar] raho sozad, [ʙalki sumoro ʙo takolifu ozmoishoi gunogun meozmojad] to palidro az pok cudo kuned; va cunin naʙud, ki Alloh taolo [ʙaroi ʙozsinosii mu'minon az munofiqon] sumoro az [asrori] ƣajʙ ogoh kunad; vale Alloh taolo az mijoni firistodagonas har kiro ʙixohad, ʙarmeguzinad [va uro ʙar ʙaxse az ƣajʙ ogoh mekunad]; pas, ʙa Alloh taolo va firistodagonas imon ʙijovared; va agar imon ʙijovared va taqvo pesa kuned, podosi ʙuzurge ʙarojaton [dar pes] ast
